name: omnitools
description: Omni Tools is a lightweight toolbox web app offering JSON viewer, URL encoder, image compressor, and more utilities for developers or productivity enthusiasts in a self-hosted environment.

features.title: Developer Utilities
features.description: Collection of essential tools including JSON formatter, URL encoder, hash generators, and text converters

features.title: Image Processing
features.description: Compress, resize, and convert images between formats with quality controls and batch processing

features.title: Text Tools
features.description: Format, validate, and transform text with regex testing, case conversion, and encoding utilities

features.title: Code Formatters
features.description: Beautify and minify code in multiple languages including JSON, XML, CSS, and JavaScript

features.title: Hash Generators
features.description: Create MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and other cryptographic hashes for security and verification purposes

features.title: Base64 Encoding
features.description: Encode and decode Base64 strings with support for files and text content

features.title: Qr Code Generator
features.description: Create customizable QR codes with different sizes, error correction levels, and output formats

features.title: Color Utilities
features.description: Convert between color formats, generate palettes, and extract colors from images
